knownrelatives: Lapetus (father), Clymene (mother), Eprimetheus, Menoecues, Atlas (brothers), Asia (wife), Deucalion (son), Pyrrha (niece/daughter-in-law), Zeus, Hera, Poseidon, Demeter, Hades, Hestia (cousins)
powers: Prometheus possesses superhuman strength, durability, immortality and is immune to conventional diseases.
